# VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel

**Enumeration**

Constants that identify the performance and accuracy of the text recognition.

## Declaration

```swift
enum VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel
```

## Recognition Levels

- **VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel.fast**: Fast text recognition returns results more quickly at the expense of accuracy.
- **VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel.accurate**: Accurate text recognition takes more time to produce a more comprehensive result.

## Creating a Recognition Level

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Customizing Recognition Constraints

- **minimumTextHeight**: The minimum height, relative to the image height, of the text to recognize.
- **recognitionLevel**: A value that determines whether the request prioritizes accuracy or speed in text recognition.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
